title: Quizzical
description: It is a quiz application that consumes the Open Trivia Database API. Quizzical is one of the first projects I developed in React.

title: Optician Manager
description: This is a CRUD application developed for an optician. This helps the user to easily manage all their patients information.

title: Time Tracker
description: Time tracker is a useful tool to check how much time has been invested in different activities. The data is being read from a json file, but it could easily be linked to an API.
